dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the crowd and avoid drawing too much attention to myself. Maybe I'll bring up a topic that doesn't involve investigation or suspicion.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Bob is the assassin. Let's work together to vote him out and ensure the safety of our village. I suggest we discuss any suspicious behavior or interactions Bob has had to build a strong case against him.
